title: todo: open issues for the encryption app
body:
some open issues for the encryption app:

- [x] versions are not decrypted during initial encryption (ready to be reviewed: https://github.com/owncloud/core/pull/4239)

- [x] decrypt all files once encryption app was disabled (ready to be reviewed: https://github.com/owncloud/core/pull/4239)

- [x] set mirgration_status to 0 for all users once encryption app was disabled

- [x] avoid race condition during migration (pr: https://github.com/owncloud/core/pull/3668) 

- [x] handle external user back-ends (pr: https://github.com/owncloud/core/pull/3558)

- [x] gallary sharing doesn't work, see (pr: https://github.com/owncloud/apps/pull/1280)

- [x] contacts generate empty .etmp files in user root (https://github.com/owncloud/core/pull/4349)

- [x] anonymous upload to encrypted owncloud (pr #5977)

- [x] enter recovery password twice to avoid typos if a new key gets generated (pr: https://github.com/owncloud/core/pull/4902)

- [x] webdav property getcontentlength not correct (owncloud/core#5090)

- [ ] if we don't have a share key, don't open the file  (see: https://github.com/owncloud/core/pull/5233#issuecomment-26121323)
